mapper.select: select U_Id,U_username,U_avater,U_email,U_sex,U_birthday,U_signature, (select count(*) umn from model,user u where M_pid in (select P_id from project p where p.P_Uid=u.U_id) and u.U_username=#{username} and u.U_password=#{password}) "uModelNum", (select count(*) upn from project p,user u where p.P_Uid=u.U_id and U_username=#{username} and U_password=#{password}) "uProjectNum" from user where U_username=#{username} and U_password=#{password}
select * FROM User WHERE u_id=#{content} OR u_username LIKE '%' #{content} '%'
mapper.update: update user set U_password=#{uPassword} where U_id=#{uId}
update user set U_state=#{uState} where U_id=#{uId}
